- Supervised graph classification with Deep Graph Convolutional Neural Networks. View: [here](dgcnn-graph-classification.ipynb), [rendered](https://stellargraph.readthedocs.io/en/stable/demos/graph-classification/dgcnn-graph-classification.html)
